name: CarbonCreditTokenExposure
description: A Carbon Credit Token Exposure Implementation. In order to work with permissioned tokens, this contract needs to be added to the respective permission list.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that triggered the swap.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the token that was swapped.

parameterDecorators.name: swapAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount swapped in terms of source bundle.

parameterDecorators.name: receivedAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount received after fees in terms of target bundle.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that triggered the offset.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the token that is to be offsetted.

parameterDecorators.name: initialAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount to offset in terms of source bundle.

parameterDecorators.name: offsettedAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount offsetted after fees in terms of the token.

parameterDecorators.name: bundle_
parameterDecorators.description: - The bundle where the GCO2 currently sits.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of tokens to offset.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of offsetted tokens after fee.

functionDecorators.name: swapBundle
functionDecorators.description: Swaps a given GCO2 token between bundles.

parameterDecorators.name: sourceBundle_
parameterDecorators.description: - The bundle where the GCO2 token currently sits.

parameterDecorators.name: targetBundle_
parameterDecorators.description: - The bundle where the GCO2 token should be bundled into.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of tokens to swap.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of tokens arriving in the bundle (after fee).
